title: New: King Krule – Neptune Estate
content:
Here’s another cut taken from King Krule’s debut LP 6 Feet Beneath The Moon, released 24 August through True Panther / XL Recordings.

A slower, more refined number than lead single Easy Easy, Neptune Estate showcases an all too realistic side to Archy that is ever prominent on his first record, mixing 60’s soul inspirations, with a grittier, almost post-punk styling. Alongside one of the most distinct deliveries of any new artist, King Krule also has the rare gift of being able to speak on behalf of a generation of talented, yet flawed adolescents. With the half spoken / half rapped vocals and minimalist beat, it’s sure to build excitement for the full release.

I want to be with you / I want to be used
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
